info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brazoria and central Matagorda Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of South Texas Nuclear Plant, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Matagorda, southwestern Bay City, Sargent and Wadsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
